name: Sharphat
description:
Sharphat is an action platformer involving timing, precision, and strategy. Knock your enemies into the air by slamming onto the ground from great heights, then finish them while they are vulnerable. The low ground is your friend.

      It's free, so why not give it a try?

      Special thanks to TheoBVirtue, who supplied me with some great music for this game. You can find more of their stuff HERE
